original_text: After a long time had passed and the Lord had given Israel rest from all their enemies around them, Joshua, by then a very old man,
korean_text: 여호와께서 주위의 모든 원수들로부터 이스라엘을 쉬게 하신 지 오랜 후에 여호수아가 나이 많아 늙은지라

sentences.original_text: After a long time had passed
and the Lord had given Israel rest
from all their enemies around them
Joshua, by then a very old man
sentences.korean_translation: 여호수아는 그때 이미 매우 늙은 노인이었지만
